    • Method Detail

      • isOn

        boolean isOn(int x,
             int y)
        Determines whether point (x, y) is on the Shape
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of point
        y - y-coordinate of point
        Returns:
        true if the point (x,y) is on the Shape, false if not

      • isSelected

        boolean isSelected()
        Determines whether or not the Shape is selected
        Returns:
        true if this Shape is selected, false if not

      • setSelected

        void setSelected(boolean sel)
        Selects or de-selects Shape
        Parameters:
        sel - tells whether to select or deselect Shape

        java.awt.Color getColor()
        Determines color of Shape
        Returns:
        color of Shape

        Changes color of Shape

        color - what to set this.color to

      • shiftUpperLeftBy

        void shiftUpperLeftBy(int deltaX,
                      int deltaY)
        Shifts upper-left corner of Shape
        Parameters:
        deltaX - units to shift shape by on x-axis
        deltaY - units to shift shape by on y-axis

      • moveUpperLeftTo

        void moveUpperLeftTo(int newX,
                     int newY)
        Where to move the upper-left corner of the Shape to
        Parameters:
        newX - what to set the x-coordinate to
        newY - what to set the y-coordinate to
